Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teacher gives very little feedback, and when given no opportunity to gauge if its accurate. GenAI gives feedback 24/7. Easy to check if correct using other tools if in doubt.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Yeah, it helped me understand the content and how I was fairing.
